test_offline.label: test offline
test_offline.tooltip:
enable this to let the game play while streamer is offline
This sould only be done for testing

update_interval.label: game interval
update_interval.tooltip: Time in between gaining experience/dieing, this is the game's tick rate.

only_active.label: only reward active users exp
only_active.tooltip: when enabled, lurking people will not gain experience

add_me.label: add /me before messages
add_me.tooltip: on twitch, this shows the messages in the color from the chatbot

piebank_name.label: piebank name
piebank_name.tooltip: name people have to give to to remove bounty from thyself

fight_resolve_time.label: time to resolve a fight
fight_resolve_time.tooltip:
time after initial attack for a fight to resolve
in this time, other the attacker character can defend or new people can join

xp_farm_time.label: time to stay in an area before getting exp
xp_farm_time.tooltip: the time you need to stay in an area to gain exp. Being in a fight delays this

durable_name.label: durable name
durable_name.tooltip: name of the durable trait if enabled

durable_enabled.label: durable enabled
durable_enabled.tooltip: when checked, durable is available as a trait

strong_name.label: strong name
strong_name.tooltip: name of the strong trait if enabled

strong_enabled.label: durable enabled
strong_enabled.tooltip: when checked, strong is available as a trait

wise_name.label: wise name
wise_name.tooltip: name of the wise trait if enabled

wise_enabled.label: wise enabled
wise_enabled.tooltip: when checked, wise is available as a trait

greedy_name.label: greedy name
greedy_name.tooltip: name of the greedy trait if enabled

greedy_enabled.label: greedy enabled
greedy_enabled.tooltip: when checked, greedy is available as a trait

alert_name.label: alert name
alert_name.tooltip: name of the alert trait if enabled

alert_enabled.label: alert enabled
alert_enabled.tooltip: when checked, alert is available as a trait

lucky_name.label: lucky name
lucky_name.tooltip: name of the lucky trait if enabled

lucky_enabled.label: lucky enabled
lucky_enabled.tooltip: when checked, lucky is available as a trait

violent_name.label: violent name
violent_name.tooltip: name of the violent trait if enabled

violent_enabled.label: violent enabled
violent_enabled.tooltip: when checked, violent is available as a trait

pacifist_name.label: pacifist name
pacifist_name.tooltip: name of the pacifist trait if enabled

pacifist_enabled.label: pacifist enabled
pacifist_enabled.tooltip: when checked, pacifist is available as a trait

starting_location.label: starting location
starting_location.tooltip: location name where every newly created hero will start

info_command.label: info command
info_command.tooltip: Show your level, eq, damage/defense, location, and specials/effects.

condensed_info_command.label: condensed info command
condensed_info_command.tooltip: condensed version of info including experience progress.

stat_command.label: stat command
stat_command.tooltip: Show the current Hero and King/Queen of Pieland.

defend_command.label: defend command
defend_command.tooltip: This will give you a defense bonus and prevent looting during an attack. Will not kill attacker.

counter_command.label: counter_command
counter_command.tooltip: This will attack your attacker giving you a small damage bonus.

flee_command.label: flee command
flee_command.tooltip: This will give you a large defense bonus and but you may still be looted. You go to a random location. !move will also initiate a flee to the specified location.

queen_command.label: queen command
queen_command.tooltip: This command adjust some messages for gender.

king_command.label: king command
king_command.tooltip: This command adjust some messages for gender.

create_command.label: create command
create_command.tooltip: create a new hero if you don't already have one

move_command.label: move command
move_command.tooltip: Moves to the location and starts leveling if there are monsters.

buy_command.label: buy command
buy_command.tooltip: Attempts to purchase and equip the desired weapon or armor.

attack_command.label: attack command
attack_command.tooltip: This will start an attack on a nearby player which will resolve in 20 seconds.

look_command.label: look command
look_command.tooltip: Get an idea of your chances against a nearby player.

tax_command.label: tax command
tax_command.tooltip: This allows the king to tax everyone at a certain percentage (0-100).

vote_command.label: vote command
vote_command.tooltip: Cast your vote for Pieland's hero. Must be level 5+ to vote.

smite_command.label: smite command
smite_command.tooltip: Put a peasant in their place. They must be less than level 5.

give_command.label: give command
give_command.tooltip: give piecoins to a player. Giving to Piebank can remove bounty.

bounty_command.label: bounty command
bounty_command.tooltip: place piecoins on a player's head (loot reward).

no_character_yet.value: {0}, you don't have a character yet, create one by typing {1} {{name}}
no_character_yet.label: no character yet response
no_character_yet.tooltip: command response when user has currently no available character
